metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10891 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.5.1, 3.4.4, 3.3.7, 3.1.13.When a quiz question bank is imported, it was possible for the questionpreview that is displayed to execute JavaScript that is written into thequestion bank.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
